categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Junk Heap was the main processing plant on the planet of Ord Mantell, located in the Ord Mantell Scrapyard. It was the main gate for a long system of hovertrains that ran through the junkyard.
The Junk Heap would serve as IG-88D's headquarters after his ship was damaged by Boba Fett, until Dash Rendar broke in and destroyed the droid.
